fields.name: A duke’s son must know about poisons...Here’s a new one for you:
fields.value:
the Gom Jabbar. It kills only animals.
Attack: Powerful
Defence: None

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, choose to test a player’s humanity. If they are evil (bypassing all detection immunity or frames), you will attack them. You start with one charge of this ability.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If the tested player is good, you will secretly disable their ability, including giving random results to investigative abilities.
- If you successfully kill a player, you gain a charge of your ability.
- You can only use your ability during a full moon.
